resources.string: You can give us a call to get more information or if you found a pigeon which is in urgent need for help.

Carrier pigeon: has a ring on one or both legs, feathering can be colored differently, accompanies with feral pigeons.

Common wood pigeon: bigger than feral pigeons, adults have a white spot on their neck, yellow beak, blue eyes.
Fledglings dont own these attributes yet, but they have a white edge on their wing. Common wood pigeons don't accompany with feral pigeons.

Feral pigeon: can look very differrent, beak is usually dark grey, legs and eyes are orange-red. Fledglings have brown eyes.

Fancy pigeon: often plain-colored or strikingly spotted, long feathers on their feet or a cover on their head, sometimes rings on their feet.
Include up to three media files:
Estimate the general condition of the pigeon:
Do you have any additional information on the exact location or condition of the pigeon?

Permission has been granted by user

In order to provide the injured dove with the best possible help, we ask you to give us some information in the following steps. After reporting an injured animal, you can view the status of the case at any time and edit the given information. If you have any further comments, you can also contact us via our emergency phone at \'Contacts\'.

Level 1 (good): Slightly strapped feet, pigeon is still able to walk.

Level 2: Strapped feet, pigeon is in pain.

Level 3 (poor): Obviously hurt pigeon, which is unable to fly or walk/ fledgling on the ground (they always need instant help!), pigeons at night. These are pigeons which are easy to catch and in urge need for help (emergency call).
What kind of media would you like to add?
Please select at least one injury.
I\'m afraid we couldn\'t read your phone number. Please enter your phone number manually so that we can reach you.
Your sign-up has to get approved by an admin.
Please select the location, date and count of the observed pigeons.

Erreicht ihr mal niemanden unter der angegebenen Nummer, haben wir noch eine alternative Nummer unter der +49 157 80641268. In Hannover gibt es außerdem die Möglichkeit im Notfall zur Klinik der TiHo Google zu fahren und Stadttauben abzugeben. Wer nicht mobil ist, kann auch über die Feuerwehr (112) die Tierrettung rufen.
